%config.conf.debug_position: Send my location data to the developers (Not recommended unless you want to collaborate with your historical location data)
%config.priv.title: Privacy
%config.priv.see_picture: Who can see my profile picture?
%config.priv.see_ss: Who can see my relationship status?
%config.priv.see_tel: Who can see my phone number?
%config.priv.see_bio: Who can see my personal bio?
%config.others.title: Others
%privacy_select.E.desc: Every person close to you can see this information in your profile.
%privacy_select.L.desc: Only people you have Waved at can see this information in your profile.
%privacy_select.N.desc: No one but you can see this information.
%wavers.title: Wavers
%wavers.loading: Loading users who have Waved at you...
%wavers.nothing_yet: No one has Waved at you yet. Go out! Maybe someone get interested and Wave at you ;D.
%wave.title: Wave
%wave.direct.desc: This person will get your direct Wave, showing your profile and allowing him/her to Wave back at you.
%wave.anonymous.desc: This person will get your Wave, but we won't tell him/her it comes from you.
%wave.profile.title: Someone has Waved at you!
%wave.profile.anon: This person is anonymous. If you want to know who he/she is, you'll have to find it out yourself.
%wave.profile.details.not_anon_[val]: {0} has Waved at you. You should meet him/her personally, or return the gesture back. You can also take a look at his/her full profile.
%wave.profile.details.anon: Someone has Waved at you, but this person has done it anonymously. Maybe this person wants you to find him/her ;). What I can guarantee you is that this person is close!.
%radar.title: Radar
%radar.not_scanned: Not been able to detect users
%radar.error.scan: Failed to load the nearby users list, check Internet connection.
%radar.error.screen: Sorry we can't show near users.
%radar.error.screen.GPS_OFF: Because the GPS is off, please turn it on.
%radar.error.ghost: Even though your GPS is on, it hasn't sent your position data for more than 20 minutes. Wait until it find satellites or move to a more open place.

%profile.unlike_confirm: You will withdraw your Wave, Are you shoure?

%profile.change_password.title: Change Password
%profile.change_password.help_text: Enter your current password and then the new password twice. If you forgot your password you can reset it.
%profile.change_password.error.passwords: Both new passwords must be equals.
%profile.email_confirm.help_text:
You must validate your email. We have sent you an E-Mail with the code that you must enter in the text field below.
Then press "Send"

%profile.error.couldnt_resend_code_email: Couldn't send email with confirmation code.
%profile.error.couldnt_confirm_email: Couldn't confirm Code, Try Again and check the Code.
%profile.flag.confirm.title: Do you want to report this user?
%profile.flag.confirm.text: An anonymous accusation against the user will be sent, we will review the report and within 24 hours we will take action.
